title: Orange
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 24 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: Fall is a very exciting time for students. They look forward to the leaves changing and the weather cooling down. In Orange, students will become familiar with the color word orange through a list of orange items that can be found in the fall. Detailed photographs and repetitive text support early emergent readers. In addition to working on decoding skills, students will have the opportunity to identify the main idea and details as well as to visualize to better understand the text.
highFrequencyWords: Leveled Book Lesson PDF
awareness: Main Idea and Details                : Identify the main idea and details from a text
phonics: Initial Sound                : Discriminate initial consonant /f/ sound
wordWork: Capitalization                : Capitalize the beginning of sentences
